item.title: Norvell and Seminoles optimistic about upcoming 2025 season
item.description: Media week is happening this week in Charlotte North Carolina for football teams in the Atlantic Coast Conference (ACC). The Florida State Seminoles (FSU) took to the podium on Wednesday.

item.title: Conservation groups can’t intervene in lawsuit over whale protections, judge says
item.description: A Florida boat owner was fined $14,250 for violating a speed limit designed to protect whales.

item.description: The victim says her husband united a rope she was holding and drove off without her.

item.title: Report shows Manatee deaths are on the rise in Florida
item.description: The report says 477 manatees have died already this year, compared to 565 in all of 2024.

item.title: Hulk Hogan, professional wrestling icon, dies at 71
item.description: Hulk Hogan has died at age 71.
